blacklisted_modifications.message: We do not allow our players to utilize blacklisted modifications on our servers.

inappropriate_behavior.message: We do not allow behavior on our servers that is seen as inappropriate.

predatory_behavior.message: Predatory behavior or explicit content in any form is not permitted on our servers.

discrimination.message: We do not allow any discriminatory behavior on our servers, or toward other players.

trolling.message: Any form of trolling is not permitted on our servers.

spreading_false_information.message: Spreading false information knowingly is not permitted on our servers.

general_disrespect.message: Disrespect towards players on our servers is not permitted.

harrassment.message: Harrassing other players/and or staff is not permitted.

malicious_links.message: Redirecting players to external servers off our network is not permitted.
